question: Divyansh Singh Panwar, who was seen in news recently, is an Indian player of which sports?
explanation:
Divyansh Singh Panwar is a 17-year-old Indian shooter from Jaipur, Rajasthan. He was seen in news as he recently clinched the gold medal in Meyton Cup, a tournament held in Austria.
Divyansh won the Gold medal in the men’s 10m air rifle event and ace Indian shooter Apurvi Chandela bagged the Gold medal in the 10m air rifle women’s category. Other shooters Deepak Kumar and Anjum Moudgil also bagged a bronze medal each in men’s and women’s 10m air rifle events respectively. The four Indian shooters have already secured their quotas for the upcoming Tokyo Olympics.
